regen.absent_element: specification on varying control based on security levels
regen.new_specification: The GUI control option shall adjust event control permissions dynamically based on the determined security levels.

regen.absent_element: handling different control based on security levels
regen.new_specification: The system shall vary control permissions and actions based on predefined security levels when managing events.

regen.absent_element: control variations based on security levels
regen.new_specification: The GUI shall adjust control permissions based on the security level assigned to the system user.

label: Based on the user's security level, the control option shall provide the user with the appropriate level of control.
absence: control levels based on the user's security level
